title: Schlumberger Earnings, Revenue beat in Q3
text:
© Reuters. Schlumberger Earnings, Revenue beat in Q3

Investing.com - Schlumberger (NYSE: ) reported third quarter that beat analysts' expectations on Friday and revenue that topped forecasts.

The firm reported earnings per share of $0.43 on revenue of $8.54B. Analysts polled by Investing.com forecast EPS of $0.41 on revenue of $8.52B. That compared to EPS of $0.46 on revenue of $8.5B in the same period a year earlier. The company had reported EPS of $0.35 on revenue of $8.27B in the previous quarter.

For the year, Schlumberger shares are down 11.61%, under-performing the which is up 21.03% year to date.

Schlumberger follows other major Energy sector earnings this month

On Tuesday, July 30, 2019, Viper Energy Ut reported second quarter EPS of $0.04 on revenue of $72.19M, compared to forecasts of EPS of $0.11 on revenue of $70.2M.

GeoPark Ltd earnings missed analyst's expectations on Thursday, with third quarter EPS of $0.37 on revenue of $149M. Investing.com analysts expected EPS of $0.48 on revenue of $144.9M

Stay up-to-date on all of the upcoming earnings reports by visiting Investing.com's earnings calendar
description: Schlumberger Earnings, Revenue beat in Q3
